categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Doctor Saras was a female Imperial Intelligence agent who infiltrated a Rebel Alliance safeworld after being trained on Coruscant. She found work on in the infirmary. After a few months, she was preparing to contact her handlers using a disguised Chandrilan worry doll, but was summoned to the infirmary by Venner to scan an Imperial agent. When she arrived, the agent recognized her and she was taken into custody by the Rebels.
Saras appears in the opening story for Fantasy Flight Games' 2015 roleplaying game supplement Strongholds of Resistance.
